name: FG Stock
query:
select 
sl.item_code as "Item Code::200",
i.item_name as "Item Name::400",
i.stock_uom as "Stock UOM::100",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-DB - E21"  order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "DB Warehouse::200",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-KE - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "KE Warehouse::200",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-TU - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "TU Warehouse::200",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "Kality Warehouse - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "KA Warehouse::200",
(IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-DB - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) + IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-KE - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) + IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-TU - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) + IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "Kality Warehouse - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)) as "Total Qty::200",
i.weight_per_unit as "Weight Per Unit::300",
((IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-DB - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) + IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-KE - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) + IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-TU - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) + IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "Kality Warehouse - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)) * i.weight_per_unit) as "Total Weight::200"
from `tabItem` i join `tabStock Ledger Entry` sl  
where sl.item_code=i.item_code and sl.item_code LIKE "FG%%" and (sl.warehouse="FG-UD-DB - E21" or sl.warehouse="FG-UD-KE - E21" or sl.warehouse="FG-UD-TU - E21" or sl.warehouse="Kality Warehouse - E21" ) and (IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-DB - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) + IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-KE - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) + IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-TU - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) + IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "Kality Warehouse - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)) <>0
group by i.item_name
order by IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-DB - E21"  order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) desc,IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-KE - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)desc,IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "FG-UD-TU - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)desc,IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code= sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = "Kality Warehouse - E21" order by sli.posting_date desc,sli.posting_time desc,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)desc;
